projects: [{"title":"Medical Patient Shifter, Collaborative Engineering","start_date":"Apr 2012","description":"Pioneered integration of medical bed and innovative transferring mechanism for ease of shifting patientsConsulted with surgeons and incorporated decision making tools (AHP, QFD) for designing productAppraised by a panel of surgeons from Hinduja, Lilawati and Hiranandani HospitalsFeatured and applauded in the national medical journal “Medical Equipment and Automation” "},{},{}]
